overview: Eric Schiffer is best known for his best-selling book, “EmotionallyChargedLearning” (www.emotionallycharged.com), and his Patriarch brand of companies. His first successful business venture was at age 13, when he sold grass plucked from Candlestick park after the 49erâ€™s victory over Dallas, and sold it Nationwide as “SuperGrass”. At age 14, he launched a software company focused on the education of molecular fusion to college students winning awards from Intel and IBM. His next venture was a software company focused on forensic medicine with 30,000 physicians, which he later successful sold. He has gone on to found and successful sell many other companies, and currently leads Patriarch.com, a leading private equity company.
